column5: Ill show you mine if you'll show me yours!!!
Sorry, ours was already devoured and mutilated yesterday.  Tried this stuffing with a twist. Cranberry and nutmeats mixed in a bread stuffing. Heavenly.
Looks tasty! Mine is almost ready
Well we just had ours.It was done on indirect heat on the BBQ,basted with butter and savory. The added fix,ns were, boiled veggies and salt beef.  ENJOY.
What no Cod???
Tj you forgot to take the turkey out of its pen.  I just ate but now i am hungry again.

Mine still looks frozen. We're doing the family thang tomorrow. I'm doing some of the food prep tonite so I can get out fishing for a few hours in the morning. Got lotsa beer and plenty of veggies to clean. What else does a feller need for a great Saturday nite?     - Never mind!!!  It's our anniversary today so I'm being nice to her. After all, she's endured me for 40 years.  JF

I deep fried ours yesterday 23.50 pounds, took an hour and 15 minutes. Juicy, perfectly cooked, injected it with melted butter, lawrys seasoned salt, garlic powder and cayenne pepper. A friend who has done it lots of times brought his equipment and showed me how. I will definitely do it again.  Hope everyone has a great Thanksgiving.  SS
That better be a big turkey......  and lotsa beer... lol...
Thanksgiving doesn't come until November 27th this year  Why we didn't even have Halloween yet.............  You Canuck's are a crazy bunch  I hope you all enjoyed your dinners
Well, she's been known to refer to me as a big turkey. Is that what you meant?  JF
They only thing missing is a Sunday nascar race.LOL
LOL... ummm.... we're having Thanksgiving early this year while we all still have enough dough to buy one..
Good move to hide all the empty beer cans for the photo.
hahaha... hey I did good this year!!
We had Canadian Thanksgiving yesterday... and again today!  We'll also celebrate in November... I'm gonna be fat as a HOG by the New Year!!!
Nicely done TJ!  Our dinner is tomorrow....hopefully a morning of steelheading followed by turkey dinner...mmmmmmm  Hope everyone has a great Thanksgiving weekend!
Our bird is simply scraps on a plate. Now

I feel about as round as Homer Simpson, agony and now the eyelids are gettin droopy..ZZzzzzzzzzz. Here's for a little after supper action to get the next one: http://www.killsometime.com/games/Game.asp?ID=362
Mines in the fridge... ready to be cooked tomorrow. mmmmmmmmmmm
No cod,just toung and cheek.LOL
LOOK, another left turn...................LOL
Yah..but it's the right hand turns that make it exciting Billy Bob!  Our bird is just going in the oven....
I bought a really nice whole ham and two nice turkeys! Could not pass on the excellent price. Happy anniversary John!
